mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS id, c.post_id AS postId, c.user_id AS userId, c.content AS content, c.created_at AS created_at, u.nickname AS nickname FROM Comments c JOIN Users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC

SELECT c.id, c.content, c.created_at, c.user_id AS userId, u.nickname FROM Comments c JOIN Users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comments (post_id, user_id, content) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT nickname FROM Users WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE Comments SET content = #{content}, created_at = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Comments WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
